forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Itsame, Updatio!

comments.text: Hi everyone! Here's whatsa new in Update 160.1 (you're on [version])! Hope you enjoy!
The Desktop Stream camera (Me -> Camera dialog) will now also use the area filters, like saturation or (if Extra Effects are enabled) bloom and edge shade!
There's a new Quality button on that Camera dialog, taking you right to the Me -> More settings page!
There's a new body tell to check when the context-laser is pressed/ let go! Use e.g. "When context laser started left then become next". Thx Sloppy!
You can now suppress a placement's automatic showing at a distance handling (which happens when it's using "Try show if far away", contains placed sub-things, is very big etc.).
... Click "Enabled" on the back of the placement dialog, and untick "Show if far away"! (Note unticking this for placed sub-thing movers may cause out-of-sync issues.) Thx Jinx!

thread.latestCommentText: ... Click "Enabled" on the backside of the placement context dialog, and untick "Show if far away"! (Note unticking this for placed sub-thing movers may cause out-of-sync issues.)
